label: EO 14176
description: Executive order directing declassification of JFK/RFK/MLK files to answer 'release other files' arguments.

label: EO: English official
description: Executive Order declaring English the official language (first ever)

label: NARA update
description: National Archives posts implementation notes about EO 14176 and prior releases.

label: New travel ban
description: Signed proclamation barring citizens of 12 countries from visiting

label: Hoax rhetoric
description: Truth Social broadsides call renewed Epstein document pressure a partisan 'hoax.'

label: DC Guard move
description: White House memo mobilizes the D.C. National Guard under a 'law-and-order' mission set.

label: DOJ handoff
description: DOJ tells House Oversight it will begin producing Epstein-related records that week.

label: 33k pages
description: House Oversight publishes 33,295 DOJ-produced files online.

label: Estate cache
description: Committee releases additional materials received from the Epstein estate.
